properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 20 NOV
   BY M/V RAMFORM VICTORY TOWING TEN
   8000 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   27-14.59S 047-06.48W, 26-49.19S 046-41.07W,
   26-24.52S 046-38.06W, 26-10.04S 046-22.59W,
   26-09.21S 046-17.58W, 26-01.26S 046-13.51W,
   26-00.07S 044-58.54W, 28-14.39S 044-58.26W,
   28-14.34S 047-16.30W, 27-28.07S 047-16.25W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 210001Z NOV 23.
